Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 36th/Albany
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 36th Place, Kedzie and 36th street due to street blockage near 36th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 36th Place, Kedzie and 36th street due to street blockage near 36th/Albany.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
